Wildrider/Sinnertwin/Motormaster

Wildrider pulls the last piece of metal out. He then steps back to let
Astrotrain transform.

Motormaster looks at Dead-End with rage on his face, the first time,
thinking clearly. He throws a fist towards him. "NO, I am a loyal and
strong soldier."

Sinnertwin's heads both lick their lips in anticipation, hoping that
Rippersnapper would share his kill.
